# Next Petrol ## Safety Guide
1. Keep your hands clean. 2. If possible use the mask on closed places. 3. If you feel something go to the infermary imediatly. 4. Avoid smoking underground.
## Mandatory rules 1. If you hear the alarm, is not a training. 2. Shift rules are not negotiable. 3. Keep your phones always charged.
We are building a better future. We'll be always here for you!
Next Petrol Director
